name: Diabetes Mellitus
description: A metabolic disease characterized by high blood sugar levels resulting from insulin resistance or insufficient insulin production.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure, a long-term medical condition in which the blood pressure in the arteries is persistently elevated.
symptom: Pounding in the chest, neck, or ears
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Asthma
description: Chronic respiratory condition characterized by inflammation and narrowing of the airways.

name: Arthritis
description: Inflammation of one or more joints, causing pain and stiffness that can worsen with age.

name: Obesity
description: Excessive body weight due to the accumulation of fat, which can negatively impact health.

name: Anxiety Disorders
description: A group of mental disorders characterized by feelings of anxiety and fear.
ayurvedicHomeRemedies: Shirodhara (Ayurvedic oil treatment for the forehead)

name: Depression
description: A mood disorder characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest, and hopelessness.
ayurvedicHomeRemedies: Shirodhara (Ayurvedic oil treatment for the forehead)

name: Insomnia
description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep, or waking up too early and not being able to fall back asleep.

name: Migraine
description: A neurological condition characterized by recurrent, severe headaches often accompanied by other symptoms.
symptom: Sensitivity to light, sound, and smell

name: Chronic Back Pain
description: Persistent pain felt in the back that lasts for weeks, months, or even years.

name: Digestive Disorders
description: A group of disorders affecting the digestive system, causing discomfort and interference with normal digestive processes.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: Also known as hay fever, allergic rhinitis is an allergic response to specific allergens causing inflammation of the nasal passages.

name: Eczema
description: A chronic skin condition characterized by inflamed, red, itchy patches of skin.

name: Psoriasis
description: A chronic autoimmune condition characterized by patches of abnormal skin, typically red, itchy, and scaly.

name: Acne
description: A common skin condition characterized by inflammation of the hair follicles and oil glands, leading to pimples, blackheads, and whiteheads.

name: Gastric Ulcers
description: Open sores that develop on the inner lining of the stomach.
ayurvedicHomeRemedies: Warm water with a pinch of salt
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS)
description: Physical and emotional symptoms that occur in the luteal phase of the menstrual cycle.
yoga: Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Menstrual Irregularities
description: Abnormal variations in the menstrual cycle, including changes in duration and flow.
yoga: Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Menopausal Symptoms
description: Symptoms experienced by women during the menopausal transition.
yoga: Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
description: A hormonal disorder causing enlarged ovaries with small cysts on the outer edges.

name: Erectile Dysfunction
description: Inability to achieve or maintain an erection during sexual activity.

name: Premature Ejaculation
description: Ejaculation that occurs sooner than desired, either before or shortly after penetration.
symptom: Ejaculation that occurs within one minute of penetration
remedy: Behavioral techniques (e.g., start-stop technique, squeeze technique)

name: Infertility
description: Inability to conceive after one year of regular, unprotected intercourse.

name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
description: Persistent fatigue that interferes with daily activities and doesn't improve with rest.

name: Fibromyalgia
description: Chronic disorder characterized by widespread musculoskeletal pain, fatigue, and tenderness in localized areas.
remedy: Medications for pain management (e.g., analgesics, antidepressants)

name: Chronic Sinusitis
description: Inflammation of the sinuses lasting for more than 12 weeks, often caused by infection or allergies.

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the lining of bronchial tubes, causing coughing, shortness of breath, and mucus production.

name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
description: Progressive lung disease characterized by chronic bronchitis and emphysema.
symptom: Swelling in ankles, feet, or legs

name: Allergies
description: An exaggerated immune response to substances in the environment.

name: Anemia
description: A condition characterized by a deficiency of red blood cells or hemoglobin in the blood.
remedy: Medications to increase red blood cell production
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Osteoporosis
description: A condition characterized by weakening of bones, making them fragile and more prone to fractures.
remedy: Balanced diet rich in calcium and vitamin D

name: Gout
description: A type of arthritis caused by excessive uric acid in the blood, leading to sudden and severe pain, swelling, and redness in joints.
remedy: Medications to lower uric acid levels
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Hepatitis
description: Inflammation of the liver, often caused by viral infections, alcohol abuse, or autoimmune diseases.
symptom: Yellowing of the skin and eyes (jaundice)
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
description: A common disorder affecting the large intestine, causing abdominal pain, bloating, gas, diarrhea, and constipation.
symptom: Urgency to have a bowel movement

name: Colitis
description: Inflammation of the colon, causing abdominal pain, diarrhea, blood in the stool, and fatigue.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Crohn's disease
description: A type of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) characterized by inflammation of the digestive tract, leading to abdominal pain, diarrhea, weight loss, and fatigue.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Peptic ulcer disease
description: A sore that develops on the lining of the stomach, small intestine, or esophagus, often caused by bacteria or excessive use of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs).
remedy: Dietary changes (avoiding spicy foods, caffeine, alcohol)
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Thyroid disorders
description: Conditions affecting the thyroid gland, which can lead to hormonal imbalances and various symptoms.

name: Chronic kidney disease

Changes in urination frequency or color
yoga: Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Urinary tract infections (UTIs)
description: Infections affecting the urinary tract, often caused by bacteria and characterized by symptoms such as frequent urination, pain or burning during urination, and abdominal discomfort.

yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)
Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Kidney stones
description: Hard deposits of minerals and salts that form inside the kidneys, often causing severe pain and discomfort as they pass through the urinary tract.

name: Dermatitis

yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Cirrhosis
description: A late stage of scarring (fibrosis) of the liver caused by many forms of liver diseases and conditions, such as hepatitis and chronic alcoholism.
symptom: Yellow discoloration in the skin and eyes (jaundice)
Fluid buildup in the legs (edema) and abdomen (ascites)
Confusion, drowsiness, and slurred speech (hepatic encephalopathy)
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Glaucoma
description: A group of eye conditions that damage the optic nerve, usually due to an abnormally high pressure in the eye.
symptom: Patchy blind spots in your side (peripheral) or central vision, frequently in both eyes
Tunnel vision in the advanced stages

name: Cataracts
description: A clouding of the normally clear lens of your eye.
symptom: Frequent prescription changes in your eyewear

name: Macular degeneration
description: A chronic eye disease that causes vision loss in the center of your field of vision.
symptom: Visual distortions, such as straight lines appearing wavy or crooked
Reduced central vision in one or both eyes
The need for increasingly bright light for reading and other tasks
Difficulty adapting to low light levels
Decreased intensity or brightness of colors

name: Retinal disorders
description: Various diseases and conditions affecting the retina, the light-sensitive tissue at the back of the eye.
symptom: Floaters (tiny specks that float across the field of vision)
Flashes of light in the affected eye
Curtain-like shadows in the visual field

name: Dengue hemorrhagic fever
description: A severe, potentially deadly infection spread by certain species of mosquitoes.
symptom: Mild bleeding (such as nosebleed, gum bleed, or easy bruising)
remedy: Avoiding certain pain relievers containing aspirin, ibuprofen, or naproxen

description: An intestinal infection marked by diarrhea, cramps, nausea, and vomiting.

description: An inflammation of the middle ear, usually caused by bacteria and often associated with upper respiratory infections.

description: A common respiratory virus that usually causes mild, cold-like symptoms.

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the lining of the bronchial tubes, often caused by viral or bacterial infection.

name: Cough
description: A reflex action that helps clear the throat and airways of foreign particles, mucus, or irritants.

name: Sinusitis
description: Inflammation or swelling of the tissue lining the sinuses, which can cause sinus blockages and pain.

name: Headache
description: Pain in any region of the head. Headaches may occur on one or both sides of the head, be isolated to a certain location, radiate across the head from one point, or have a viselike quality.
ayurvedicHomeRemedies: Massaging peppermint oil onto the temples

name: Migraine
description: A severe, painful headache that can be preceded or accompanied by sensory warning signs such as flashes of light, blind spots, tingling in the arms and legs, nausea, vomiting, and increased sensitivity to light and sound.
symptom: Sensitivity to light, sound, and sometimes smell and touch
remedy: Rest in a dark, quiet room
Avoid triggers (certain foods, stress, lack of sleep)
ayurvedicDiet: Foods rich in magnesium (leafy greens, nuts, seeds)

description: An allergic reaction to certain substances, causing symptoms like sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes.

name: Conjunctivitis (Pink eye)
description: Inflammation of the conjunctiva, the clear tissue covering the white part of the eye and lining the inner surface of the eyelid.
symptom: Redness in the white of the eye
Discharge that may be yellow, green, or white
Crusting of the eyelids or lashes

name: Sore throat
description: Pain, scratchiness, or irritation of the throat that often worsens when swallowing.
symptom: Pain or irritation in the throat
remedy: Drinking warm fluids like tea or soup
Honey and lemon in warm water

name: Strep throat
description: A bacterial infection that causes inflammation and pain in the throat.
symptom: Swollen lymph nodes in the neck
remedy: Pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen

name: Tonsillitis
description: Inflammation of the tonsils, usually due to a viral or bacterial infection.
symptom: White or yellow coating on tonsils
remedy: Pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen

name: Tooth decay (Cavities)
description: Damage to the tooth enamel, often caused by acids produced by bacteria in the mouth.
symptom: Visible pits or holes in teeth
Mild to sharp pain when eating or drinking
White, brown, or black staining on the tooth surface
Visible holes or pits in teeth
ayurvedicRemedies: Clove oil application on the affected tooth

name: Gingivitis
description: Gingivitis is a common and mild form of gum disease (periodontal disease) that causes irritation, redness, and swelling (inflammation) of your gingiva, the part of your gum around the base of your teeth.
symptoms: Bleeding gums, especially during brushing or flossing
Changes in the color of gums
Formation of pockets between teeth and gums
remedy: Aloe vera gel application to gums
Oil pulling with coconut or sesame oil
foodAvoid: Hard foods that can irritate gums

name: Diarrhea
description: Diarrhea is characterized by loose, watery stools or frequent bowel movements.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

description: Diarrhea is characterized by loose, watery stools or frequent bowel movements.

name: Constipation
description: Constipation refers to bowel movements that are infrequent or difficult to pass.
symptoms: Fewer than three bowel movements a week
Feeling as though there's a blockage in your rectum
Feeling as though you can't completely empty the stool from your rectum
Need to use manual maneuvers to have a bowel movement
ayurvedicRemedies: Dried ginger powder with warm water
ayurvedicHomeRemedies: Sesame oil massage on the abdomen
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Urinary tract infection (UTI)
description: A urinary tract infection (UTI) is an infection in any part of your urinary system — your kidneys, ureters, bladder, and urethra.
symptoms: Passing frequent, small amounts of urine
remedy: Urinate when needed; don't hold it
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)
Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Sprains and strains
description: Sprains and strains are injuries to the ligaments or muscles caused by overstretching or tearing.

name: Insomnia
description: Insomnia is a sleep disorder characterized by difficulty falling asleep, staying asleep, or both.
symptom: Waking up frequently during the night
remedy: Limiting exposure to screens before bedtime
Avoiding caffeine and nicotine late in the day
Avoiding large meals and beverages before bedtime
yoga: Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Anxiety
description: Anxiety is a normal response to stress or danger, but excessive or persistent anxiety can interfere with daily activities and quality of life.
symptom: Having a sense of impending danger, panic, or doom
Difficulty concentrating or thinking about anything other than the present worry
yoga: Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)

name: Depression
description: Depression is a mood disorder characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, hopelessness, and loss of interest or pleasure in activities.
symptom: Feelings of guilt, worthlessness, or helplessness

Difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions
